headline: The Race to Save a Salamander That Spawned a Global Cottage Industry
summary: From TikTok to McDonald’s Happy Meals, Mexico’s ancient axolotl is everywhere, except where it is supposed to be—in the wild.

raw.headline: The Race to Save a Salamander That Spawned a Global Cottage Industry
raw.summary: From TikTok to McDonald’s Happy Meals, Mexico’s ancient axolotl is everywhere, except where it is supposed to be—in the wild.

headline: Safe Compounder McDonald’s Stock (MCD) Demands Reassuring Premium
summary: McDonald’s (MCD) stock has proven highly resilient in recent weeks against the broader market’s brutal sell-off, once again reminding us of its safe compounder status. While the fast-food goliath is dealing with inflation headwinds and shifts in consumer spending, it recently celebrated all-time record revenues and earnings. Even as the stock hovers near its 52-week highs, I think it remains reasonably valued, given the company’s proven strength, overall outlook, and unique qualities. Given the
